title: Dogs on Sweaters: Knitting Patterns for Over 18 Different Breeds
description: Knit your own beloved pet onto a one-of-a-kind garment you’ll adore. Expert knitters―and longtime dog enthusiasts―Sally Muir and Joanna Osborne are famous for knowing exactly what to give dog lovers who knit, which we all discovered in their bestselling book Knit Your Own Dog . Now, they’re back with even more ways to knit a new best friend, or show the world the kind of canine pal you favor. Dogs on Sweaters features patterns for 18 popular dog breeds, as well as designs for comfortable, stylish sweaters that are perfect for featuring them. And don’t worry if your pup is a rare breed or a delightful mutt―Muir and Osborne have you covered, providing instructions for customizing a dog pattern all your own.
author: Sally Muir
